column1: A funeral service will be held on Tuesday
column2: June 16 at 10:30 AM at Heritage Funeral Home with Mike Bryan and Randy Fox officiating. Burial will follow at Haynes Cemetery in Maury County. The family will receive friends for visitation on Monday
column3: June 15 from 4:00-8:00 PM as well as one hour prior to the service on Tuesday at the funeral home. Heritage Funeral Home is assisting the family with arrangements.
